API_Description: Represents the author of the document, typically used for metadata purposes.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'ANSB_Author' suggests it is related to the author information of the document, which is commonly used as metadata.
Returns: A string representing the author's name.
Returns_Reason: Author information is typically represented as a string containing the name of the author.

type.description: The data type of the author property, which is expected to be a string.
type.description_reason: Author names are generally represented as strings.
type.type_reason: The author property is expected to be a string as it represents textual information.
